strategies.title: STRATEGY #001 - Multi-Phase Intelligence Operations
strategies.description: A comprehensive framework for planning and executing complex intelligence operations across multiple phases. This strategy covers reconnaissance, infiltration, collection, exfiltration, and operational security considerations.

strategies.title: STRATEGY #002 - The Operator's Loop: Strategy that Breathes
strategies.description: A dynamic, repeatable loop designed for real-time decision-making, adaptation, and situational dominance in uncertain, high-friction environments. This strategy replaces rigid planning with a living operational rhythm that adjusts continuously to threat, terrain, and timing.
